name: Word Demon
description:
Ad Free Mobile Games - No annoying Adverts to ruin your Gameplay!

Test your SKILL, SPEED & CONCENTRATION in this ADDICTIVE and FAST PACED word game!

Do you think you are good at memorizing words? Can you spell words in super quick time? How’s your concentration.............. Download Word Demon and see if you can achieve a great score as well as a top achievement!

The aim of the game is to memorize where the goal letters are and reveal them as quickly as possible by tapping the screen. You will need to be super fast because the time ticks away very quickly! Before you know it you will only have milliseconds left before your time is up - You are against the clock for every word!

Will you achieve legendary status or be ranked top of the leader board and be a true Word Demon?

Game Features

● EASY TO PLAY

Suitable for all age groups!

● ADDICTIVE

Will keep you wanting to achieve more!

● SIMPLE

Easy to play! Just tap the screen to reveal letters!

● FUN

Cartoon style theme and no complicated rules!

● TOP SCORES & ACHIEVEMENTS

Try and get to the top of the Leaderboard and Achieve Legendary Ranking.

The game uses thousands of words from the ENGLISH dictionary as well as hundreds of other strange words you may not of heard before - as the levels progress the words get longer!

This game is available on the iPhone and also a HD version for the iPad. It uses Game Center to record scores and achievements .
